Package shukan

Class ShukanSchedule

java.lang.Object
shukan.ShukanSchedule
public class ShukanSchedule extends Object
Sequence of queues of activities for each week.

  • Constructor Summary

      Gets the contents of all the queues.
      Returns:

      public int left(int n)
      Pushes a token to the left in a queue.
      Parameters:
      n - Index of the queue in the sequence.
      Returns:
      the new queue (week) for the shifted token.

      Pushes a sequence of tokens to the left in a queue.
